item.title: Valtteri Bottas
item.description: "Valtteri, it's James." I’ve been working on some art for a new project that expands the service our Server Manager provides for Assetto Corsa. Here’s Bottas. This was my first time using an iPad (the iPad Pro 2018, that I borrowed) to draw something, and i’m pretty happy with how it came out! Mixing the “real” feeling of using a traditional pencil directly onto a drawing surface with all of the added benefits that come with working in art software really does create a powerful and unique experience.
